title: About
text:
Hi there! I’m Sam Bailey, and I’m a Principal Data Scientist at Booking.com. My day job involves a lot of python, statistics, and randomised controlled trials.
But in my free time, I like to explore new topics that catch my interest. That usually involves writing some python or julia, whether it’s coding something from scratch or just testing out a new library.
At the end of the day, I try to put my thoughts into words and share them on this blog. I hope you find my musings interesting and maybe even useful! Thanks for stopping by.
This text was edited by ChatGPT, with the prompt “Make this sound like a light hearted, ‘about me’ section of a blog”.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Julia Code
text:
Now lets try some julia code…

using Plots

plot(sin, 
     x->sin(2x), 
     0, 
     2π, 
     leg=false, 
     fill=(0,:lavender))





println(20.0)

20.0
